resources.string: You can request different Government services online through Irembo
Urubuga rusabirwaho serivise za Leta mu Rwanda.

Irembo is a Government to Citizen e-Service portal, which facilitates the citizen to submit the application for various services. This is a joint project by Government of Rwanda and Rwanda Development Board.


 For urgent support: 
 __________________

 please send us email : 
 ( Email: callcenter@rwandaonline.rw ) 
 - Chat with us online. Talk to one of our listening employees : 
 Facebook : 
 https://web.facebook.com/irembogov/

 https://irembo.gov.rw/home/citizen/all_services
